  ## ⚡ (ɢɪᴠᴇ sᴛᴀʀ)

 <p align="center"> 
 <b>𝗗𝗘𝗣𝗟𝗢𝗬𝗠𝗘𝗡𝗧 𝗠𝗘𝗧𝗛𝗢𝗗𝗦</b>

  <h2 align="center">  
    ⇝ ɪɴsᴛᴀʟʟ ʟᴏᴄᴀʟʟʏ ᴏʀ ᴏɴ ᴀ ᴠᴘs ⇜ 

 </h2> 

 ```console 

 $ sudo apt upgrade 
 $ sudo apt install python3-pip 
 $ git clone https://github.com/Marrk-85/MarkMusic
 $ cd MarkMusic 
 $ pip3 install -U -r requirements.txt 
 $ cd  MARKX
 $ cp config.py 

 ``` 

 <h3 align="center">  
   ᴇᴅɪᴛ <b>config.py</b> ᴡɪᴛʜ ɪɴ ʏᴏᴜʀ ᴏᴡɴ ᴠᴀʟᴜᴇs 

 </h3> 

 <h2 align="center">  
 ⇝ ʀᴜɴ ᴅɪʀᴇᴄᴛʟʏ ⇜ 

 </h2> 

 ```console 

 $ python3 -m MARKX

 ```
